Articles.Content:
False.

The user below me can't stop playing KSP.

No. I actually just uninstalled it of my own free will. But it will be back soon.

TUBM is quick.

quick to what spam the user above me? quick in movement quick when driving quik with and other things?

tubm has no naboirs

I actually do.

The user below me has 3 eyes.

no and some people can take that the wrong way

tubm thinks 1.0 was better than 1.02

Not really.

The user below me is defending Alpha.

actually yes i am

the user below computer is over 3 years old

Yes.

TUBM is over three years old.

False.

The user below me actually has an opinion on the ISS's orbit inclination.

True, unfortunate but necessary.

The user below me doesn't type "TUBM" in this game.

I have once. Usually don't though.

The user below me likes typing.

That would be true.

The user below me is neither the user above me, nor a moderator.

TRUE DAT!

I am neither a moderator, nor the user above you!

I'm a fox - behind a laptop - playin' KSP and browsin' the web...

(J.K. - I'm human)

The user below me loves mathematics.

True, came first in state for competions multiple times.

The user below me is not male.

Correct, I just happen to be a boy scout. XD

TUBM is in need of either sleep of caffeine.

Er, what? Did someone say something? I think I must've dozed off.

The user below me is wide awake.

True.

The user below me has crashed into Kerbol.

True. Not sure it's possible in 1.0.x though, the ship will explode from overheating first.

The user below me plays a sport regularly.

Not really. Space is my only sport.

The user is less than 10 years old.

False.

The user below me has met the kraken.

And my life was forever changed.

The user below me has experienced a dÃƒÂ©jÃƒÂ  vu recently.

Nope.

the user below me has "accidently" blown up the whole KSC

Correct!

The user below me IS the kraken.

Not really.

The user below me can fly a rocket backwards.

Easy, turn it to face the retrograde marker.

The user below me can fly a plane backwards.
